de.nec.nle.siafu.model
Class Overlay

java.lang.Object
  de.nec.nle.siafu.model.Overlay
All Implemented Interfaces:
Overlayable
Direct Known Subclasses:
BinaryOverlay, DiscreteOverlay, RealOverlay
public abstract class Overlay
extends Object
implements Overlayable

An overlay is in essence a matrix which maps a value to each position of the simulated world. Depending on the overlay type, the value can be a boolean value, a discrete value, or others, wrapped in the Publishable format. An overlay can be created from an image provided in the simulation data, or manually by setting the values of the matrix.

Author:
Miquel Martin

Field Detail

value

protected int[][] value
The value matrix. This values are integers, and are mapped to the real output by the specific implementation of getValue().

name

protected String name
The overlay name. Note that two overlays are the same if they have the same name.

Constructor Detail

protected Overlay(String name,
                  InputStream is)
Perform the common operations to create an overlay from an image: set the name and read the values from the InputStream.

Parameters:
name - the overlay name
is - the InputStream with the image that represents the overlay values

Method Detail

getOverlay

public static Overlay getOverlay(String name,
                                 InputStream is,
                                 org.apache.commons.configuration.Configuration simulationConfig)
Get an instance of Overlay which fits the particular overlay defined in the simulation data. The values come from the InputStream obtained from simulation data, and the name, type and type details are obtained from the simulation configuration.

Parameters:
name - the overlay name
is - the InputStream that represents the values
simulationConfig - the configuration details for the overlay
Returns:
an instance of Overlay whose getValue() method returns what you would expect from the overlay subtype

fillMatrix

protected int[][] fillMatrix(InputStream is)
Fill the value matrix from the data in an InputStream which is linked to an image.

Parameters:
is - the InputStream with the image
Returns:
the filled value matrix

getName

public String getName()
Get the name of the overlay.

Returns:
the overlay name

getValueMatrix

public int[][] getValueMatrix()
Get the matrix with the integer values of the overlay. This values are independent on how the overlay type actually maps them to a Publishable value.

Returns:
an integer matrix with the values

getValue

public abstract Publishable getValue(Position pos)
Get a Publishable object that represents the value, as mapped by the overlay type. For instance, a binary overlay will return a BooleanType, and a discrete one will return a Text.

Parameters:
pos - the position for which we want to read the value
Returns:
the Publishable with the value

toString

public String toString()
Get a string representation of the overlay by printing out the overlay's name.

Overrides:

Returns:
the overlay's name

equals

public boolean equals(Object obj)
Compare two overlays. Two overlays are the same if they have the same name, regarding of their value matrix.

Overrides:

Returns:
